subject: From: Sarah Abdallah <annam
body:
From: Sarah Abdallah <annamedinat@gmail.com>
Sent: Saturday, October 2, 2021 
Subject: Accept My Request
 
Response to me immediately,
I am Mrs Sarah Abdallah, I am a widow. I am contacting you because I
am dying and have been informed that I have less than 2 month to live.
I am  suffering from a long time cancer of the breast. from all
indication my condition is really deteriorating, and my doctors have
courageously advised me that I may not live beyond the 2 months; this
is because the cancer stage has reached a critical stage.
I have no one to whom to leave my legacy, this is the reason why I
contacted you to donate my wealth to you . In order to help the poor
with my wealth on your behalf. This transaction is 100% genuine. I
have a large sum of amount   USD $ 4.7 Million. dollars that I inherit
from my late husband and I want to make it available to you, for good
will to help the poor. And children in difficulty.  Please let me know
urgently if you are interested to enable me to give you more details
and also to put you in contact with my bank manager for immediate
transfer of these funds into your account.  I wish you  the blessing
and protect of Almighty God.
Yours Sincerely,
Mrs. Sarah Abdallah,

subject: Re:    From: Sarah Abdallah <annam
body:
Hello Mrs. Sarah Abdallah,

I'm really sorry to hear about your health condition. It's truly admirable that you're thinking of helping others in such a difficult time. I'm curious, how did you come across my contact information? And why did you choose me for this noble cause?

Also, could you please share more details about the charities or organizations that you would like me to support with this donation? I'd love to know more about your vision and the kind of impact you wish to create.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Sarah
